Text:
great upload as usual. for dvdrip V9/A9. thanks for the upload SaM. 

also, no cinavia, at least through about 23 minutes so far, and the normal point where it kicks in is around the 20 minute mark.
The text at the beginning of the movie is in spanish/espanol whole movie is english though.

A:9 V:8
Eight just cause we could not read the Spanish intro. Nice Quality. We chose to wait till there is a BDrip. I have a 2 year old 63" Samsung Plasma. DvD's Look so messed up after you been spoiled by BluRays!!! No Cinavia btw. Played from my modded PS3 750GB
